abstract: — Representatives for the studios and the striking writers returned to the bargaining table at 1 p.m. Eastern time. “A possible news blackout could keep further details from being released,” The Associated Press notes.
lead_paragraph: — Representatives for the studios and the striking writers returned to the bargaining table at 1 p.m. Eastern time. “A possible news blackout could keep further details from being released,” The Associated Press notes.

headline.main: Clips: Strike Talks Resume, Anne Sweeney, Change On ‘The Early Show’
